_header: I can not half the woe complain
Title(s): ‘Balade made of Isabelle, Countasse of War[rewyk] and Lady Despenser, by Richard Beauchamp, Eorlle of Warrewyk’
Subjects: Isabelle, countess of Warwick; Despenser, lady; virelais
_description: ‘Balade made of Isabelle, Countasse of War[rewyk] and Lady Despenser, by Richard Beauchamp, Eorlle of Warrewyk’ — a virelai, sixty-one lines

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
I can not half þe woe compleyneþat doþe my woful
                    hert streyne…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines: …haue I giveffor euer more whyles þat I lyve
BLAdd16165.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript in London,  British Library Egerton 2257, ff.
                        15-16v.
BLAdd16165.Attributed Author: by Richard Beauchamp Eorlle of Warrewyk (f. 245v)
BLAdd16165.Attributed Title:
Balade made of Isabelle Camtasse of Warrewyk and lady despenser by Richard
                    Beauchamp Eorlle of Warrewyk (f. 245v)
BLAdd16165.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “The Earl of Warwick’s Virelai.” 
             PMLA
         22 (1907): 597-607: 605-7.
